targets.rawSql:
SELECT timestamp, player_count - bot_count
FROM a2s.info i 
where $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT timestamp, ((player_count-bot_count) / max_players) * 100
FROM a2s.info i 
where $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT sum(duration)/60 as minutes
FROM a2s.players 
WHERE timestamp = (SELECT max(timestamp) FROM a2s.players WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address') AND address = '$address'

SELECT name AS Name, score AS Score, duration/60 AS Minutes 
FROM a2s.players 
WHERE timestamp = (SELECT max(timestamp) FROM a2s.players WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address') AND address = '$address'
ORDER BY score DESC

SELECT timestamp, server_name
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT timestamp, game
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT timestamp, CONCAT(player_count-bot_count , '/',max_players) players
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT timestamp, max_players
FROM a2s.info i 
where $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT player_count - bot_count AS players, bot_count AS bots, max_players - player_count AS empty
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT timestamp, sum(score) as score
FROM a2s.players p
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
GROUP BY  timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
    timestamp, 
    CASE 
        WHEN platform = 'w' THEN 'Windows' 
         WHEN platform = 'l' THEN 'Linux' 
        ELSE 'Unkown' 
    END AS platform
FROM 
    a2s.info i 
    WHERE  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY 
    timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT timestamp, map_name
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT timestamp, CASE 
        WHEN password_protected = 1 THEN 'True' 
         WHEN password_protected = 0 THEN 'False' 
    END AS  password_protected
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
    timestamp, 
    CASE 
        WHEN server_type = 'd' THEN 'Dedicated' 
         WHEN server_type = 'l' THEN 'Non Dedicated' 
           WHEN server_type = 'p' THEN 'HLTV' 
        ELSE 'Unkown' 
    END AS platform
FROM 
    a2s.info i 
    WHERE  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY 
    timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT timestamp, bot_count
FROM a2s.info i 
where $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS ts, avg(ping*1000) AS milliseconds
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT count(distinct name) AS count 
FROM a2s.players 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address'

SELECT timestamp, version
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE  $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT timestamp, CASE 
        WHEN vac_enabled = 1 THEN 'True' 
         WHEN vac_enabled = 0 THEN 'False' 
    END AS  vac_enabled
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT score AS Score
FROM a2s.players 
WHERE timestamp = (SELECT max(timestamp) FROM a2s.players WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address') AND address = '$address'
ORDER BY score DESC

SELECT duration/60 AS Minutes 
FROM a2s.players 
WHERE timestamp = (SELECT max(timestamp) FROM a2s.players WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address') AND address = '$address'
ORDER BY score DESC

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS ts, avg(max_players) AS `Max Players`, avg(player_count) - Bots AS `Players`, avg(bot_count) AS `Bots`
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts ASC

SELECT ts, r as rate 
FROM(select ts, 
lagInFrame(s) OVER (ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS p,
lagInFrame(ts) OVER (ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS t,
s-p as trend,
ts - t as delta,
trend / delta as r
 FROM
(
SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS ts, max(score) as s
FROM (
SELECT timestamp, sum(score) as score
FROM a2s.players p
where $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
GROUP BY  timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp ASC
)
group by ts
ORDER BY ts ASC) 
LIMIT 18446744073709551615 OFFSET 1) where rate >=0

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS ts, max(ping*1000) AS `Max Ping`
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts ASC

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS ts, MAX(score) AS score
FROM (
SELECT timestamp, sum(score) as score
FROM a2s.players p
where $__timeFilter(timestamp) and address = '$address'
GROUP BY  timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp ASC
)
group by ts
ORDER BY ts ASC

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS ts, last_value(map_name) AS map_name 
FROM a2s.info i 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND address = '$address'
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY ts ASC

list.definition: select distinct(address) as endpoint, server_name from a2s.info WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.label: Server
list.name: address
list.query: select distinct(address) as endpoint, server_name from a2s.info WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
